short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the div with ID 'qmetry-section' from specified pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simply removes any DIV tag that is present on a website.
Main reason for its existence is to stop the auto-scrolling "feature" of Q-Metry.
